headline: Colgate-Palmolive Webcasts Fireside Chat at the dbAccess Global Consumer Conference
summary: NEW YORK, May 21, 2025--Colgate-Palmolive (NYSE:CL) Chairman, President and CEO, Noel Wallace will participate in a fireside chat at the dbAccess Global Consumer Conference in Paris on Wednesday, June 4, 2025 at 8:00 am ET.

content.title: Colgate-Palmolive Webcasts Fireside Chat at the dbAccess Global Consumer Conference
content.summary: NEW YORK, May 21, 2025--Colgate-Palmolive (NYSE:CL) Chairman, President and CEO, Noel Wallace will participate in a fireside chat at the dbAccess Global Consumer Conference in Paris on Wednesday, June 4, 2025 at 8:00 am ET.

headline: Uber Freight bets big on AI tools to grow its business
summary: Three years ago, as the pandemic caused chaos for companies big and small, Colgate-Palmolive’s chief supply chain officer Luciano Sieber orchestrated a “logistics blitz.” The result gave Sieber a better understanding of how Colgate-Palmolive moves its products around the world. But it stuck Sieber with another problem: too much data. About a year ago, Sieber says he found a solution to that problem with Uber Freight. The ride-hailing service’s long-running logistics and analytics arm has been de
